import React from 'react' class AddProduct extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { name: "", imageUrl: "", description: "", price: 0, }; } onAddClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const product = { name: this.state.name, imageUrl: this.state.imageUrl, description: this.state.description, price: this.state.price, }; axios .post("/api/products/add", product) .then((res) => { this.setState({ name: "", description: "", imageUrl: "", price: 0 }) }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; onChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }, this.validateField(name, value)); }; render() { return ( <>
